subject: Rugby
lead_paragraph: The South Sydney team has 20 championships in Australia’s National Rugby League, but has not played for a title since 1971. This weekend the Rabbitohs take on the Bulldogs in the Grand Final.
snippet: The South Sydney team has 20 championships in Australia’s National Rugby League, but has not played for a title since 1971. This weekend the Rabbitohs take on the Bulldogs in the Grand Final.
